anya-e0702n8:1: 8. Idāni yathāvuttamātikāvasena mahiṃsakaraṭṭhasāsanavaṃsakathāmaggaṃ vattuṃ okāso anuppatto, tasmā taṃ vakkhāmi.
anya-e0702n8:2: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero mahārevattheraṃ mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ pesesi,- tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti.
anya-e0702n8:3: Soca attapañcamo hutvā mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ agamāsi paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggo gaṇo alaṃ upasampadakammāyāti maññamāno. Thero mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ gantvā devadūtasuttaṃ kathesi. Suttapariyosāne cattālīsapāṇasahassāni dhammacakkhuṃ ppaṭilabhiṃsu. Cattālīsaṃyeva pāṇasahassāni pabbajiṃsu.
anya-e0702n8:6: Adhunā pana tattha sāsanassa abbhehiviya paṭicchannassa sūriyassa okāso dubbalo hutvā paññāyati.
